accepts.description: The value for the relative start time. This value will be ignored if startAbsolute is given.
The unit for the relative start time. One of: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, seconds, milliseconds. This value will be ignored if startAbsolute is given.
The start time in milliseconds since 1.1.1970 (Unix Epoch Timestamp). One of relative or absolute must be given.
The value for the relative end time. Default is the current time. This value will be ignored if endAbsolute is given.
The unit for the relative end time. One of: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, seconds, milliseconds. This value will be ignored if endAbsolute is given.
The end time in milliseconds since 1.1.1970 (Unix Epoch Timestamp). Default is the current time. One of relative or absolute must be given.
The name of the aggregator function. One of: avg, count, dev, diff, div, first, gaps, last, least_squares, max, min, percentile, rate, sampler, save_as, scale, sum, trim
The value for the aggregator sampling. Mandatory if aggregatorName is given.
The unit for the aggregator sampling. One of: years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, seconds, milliseconds. Mandatory if aggregatorName is given.
